text: Masayuki Tanimoto is an electrical engineer from Nagoya University, Japan. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for his contributions to the development of free viewpoint television and its MPEG standard. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Nagoya University faculty Category:21st-century American engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Masayuki Tanimoto
